The Science

Two tones. One entrainment.

When your left ear hears 200 Hz and your right hears 240 Hz, your brain perceives a 40 Hz gamma wave — a frequency linked to heightened neuroplasticity. Repose generates these tones in real-time, using golden ratio harmonic relationships for smooth, natural transitions.

Inhale
Adaptive Intelligence

Your breath becomes the conductor

Deep Hypnosis mode uses your phone's sensors to detect breathing in real-time. As you inhale and exhale, Repose shifts frequencies, modulates nature sounds, and times affirmations to sync with your body's rhythm. No wearable required.

A Session

The architecture of transformation

Begin
Set Your Intention
Choose your purpose — release self-doubt, manifest clarity, deepen sleep. Your intention shapes every element ahead.
Descend
Nature & Entrainment
Binaural beats guide brainwaves from beta to theta as nature soundscapes create a cocoon of calm. Golden ratio transitions ensure each shift feels effortless.
Immerse
Deep Hypnosis
In theta state, your subconscious becomes receptive. Personalized affirmations arrive in rhythm with your breath — at the moment of maximum neuroplasticity.
Activate
Gamma Entrainment
Frequencies elevate to 40 Hz gamma — the brainwave state of insight, learning, and lasting neural change. Affirmations encode into new pathways.
Return
Gentle Emergence
A slow ascent back to waking consciousness. Nature sounds brighten, frequencies ease into alpha, and you return renewed.
Harmonic Design

Built on the golden ratio

Frequency transitions follow φ (1.618) — the same mathematical relationship in seashells, galaxies, and neural branching. This creates transitions that feel organic and inevitable, mirroring the mathematics of nature.
